name: Lofty
headline: Building the NASDAQ for Real Estate.
description:
Lofty is a marketplace that let's anyone sell a house to investors online. Instead of the typical real estate transaction where one seller sells to one buyer, Lofty is much more flexible.

Sellers fractionalize their equity ownership in the property into smaller units, so that anyone can buy a portion for as little as $50, allowing access to one of the best asset classes for people who have previously been locked out. Sellers can also sell a portion of their equity (starting at just 10%) instead of the entire property or create customized HELOC structures.

Investors can browse a variety of individual real estate properties ranging from commercial strip malls, a HELOC in someone's house, Airbnbs, to a single-family rental properties, and directly purchase ownership in these properties in under 5 minutes. There is no lockup period. Users can constantly trade these ownerships with others on the marketplace.

Investors truly legally own the properties they invested in and co-manage it with other investors through an online governance program. Owners have so far voted on how to handle various repairs, delinquent tenants, the sale of the underlying property, and much more.

Lofty never custodies or handles user funds or assets. Through smart-contracts on the blockchain, all transactions are directly peer-to-peer.

If we succeed, we'll have built the NASDAQ for real estate and transformed how real estate is bought and sold in the USA.

founders.name: Jerry Chu, Founder
founders.description:
USC alum, former Barclays Risk Management Analyst, and self-taught full-stack developer. I'm currently the CEO.

YC Badge: 0xbc2e7da603f3dec73f658971c045c3023fb8975a

# The NASDAQ For Real Estate
##### Buy and sell real estate as effortlessly as trading a share of TSLA. Diversify across 150 properties in 40 markets starting at just $50 and sell with instant liquidity anytime.
[View Properties](https://www.lofty.ai/<https:/www.lofty.ai/marketplace>)[How it works![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/638f46297a37b21b0dee101d_circle-play-solid%201.png)](https://www.lofty.ai/<#>)
[![Launch YC: Lofty - The NASDAQ for real estate](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/LGz-lofty-the-nasdaq-for-real-estate/upvote_embed.svg)](https://www.lofty.ai/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/LGz-lofty-the-nasdaq-for-real-estate>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/67295777c41d030068accf43_SWAPPED%209.png)
[![A logo of NBC news displayed on https://www.lofty.ai, because they previously featured Lofty in a few of their articles and new segments.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/6303de393ab24bc8fad13ead_NBC%20png.png)](https://www.lofty.ai/<#>)[![Logo for the Business Insider publication, which has written and featured Lofty in an article before.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/6303de38bb4b84d9f2d6f561_Business%20Insider.png)](https://www.lofty.ai/<#>)[![A logo for the Forbes news publication, which has written about https://www.lofty.ai before.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/6303de382897f9e89e4b8a5c_Forbes%20png.png)](https://www.lofty.ai/<#>)[![A logo for the Business Journals news publication, which has written about https://www.lofty.ai before.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/63a35389d3a2896d7e4ba2a2_The_business_journals.png)](https://www.lofty.ai/<#>)[![A logo for the NASDAQ stock exchange, which has written about https://www.lofty.ai before.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/6303ddbcab194d0e482473d9_image.png)](https://www.lofty.ai/<#>)[![The logo for the Techcrunch news publication, which has written about https://www.lofty.ai before.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/659dcb8690526b9ddc7fe581_techcrunch.png)](https://www.lofty.ai/<#>)
## Don't get left behind by the legacy real estate market
It's time for a change. Rising down payments, inflexible terms, and soaring property prices are locking all but the wealthy out from building wealth with real estate. Lofty helps anyone lay a path to financial freedom with fractional real estate investing.
### Start investing in Lofty properties
Buy fractional ownership in properties across America.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/6410a36084096b4915ce3575_Start%20Investing%20in%20Lofty%20Properties.webp)
![A section of images showing different houses on Lofty and their potential monthly income to highlight how a user can receive automatic rental income by investing in real estate on https://www.lofty.ai](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/64109d8eb9a3837eb9f8a58f_automatically%20receive%20rent.webp)
### Automatically receive rental income
You’ll get your first rent payment that same day, and daily after that. Your holdings will grow along with the property value, too.
### Build the future you deserve
Use your rental income to buy more and more real estate and voilà – you’re on the path to financial freedom.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/6410a291dccddc9598996e78_build%20the%20future%20you%20deserve.webp)
## Invest in fractions of rental properties across America
All without leaving your living room. No experience, connections, or down payments required.
#### [902 Karlann DrBlack Hawk, CO 804227.04%Est. Annual Return](https://www.lofty.ai/<https:/www.lofty.ai/property_deal/902-Karlann-Dr_Black-Hawk-CO-80422>)#### [33008 Joshua AveActon, CA 9351016.3%Est. Annual Return](https://www.lofty.ai/<https:/www.lofty.ai/property_deal/33008-Joshua-Ave_Acton-CA-93510>)#### [1821 Donetto DrLeander, TX 7864116%Est. Annual Return](https://www.lofty.ai/<https:/www.lofty.ai/property_deal/1821-Donetto-Dr_Leander-TX-78641>)
[View Properties](https://www.lofty.ai/<https:/www.lofty.ai/marketplace>)
## You don’t have to be a pro to invest like one
Get instant access to great property deals, in-depth analysis, and a community of wealth builders from around the world.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/64109da9dff0a68432783f82_skip%20the%20down%20payment.webp)
### Skip the down payment
Acquire fractional ownership of rental properties.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/64109db79786bbdfa70ead2a_earn%20rent%20and%20appreciation.webp)
### Earn rent today, appreciation tomorrow
Get daily rent payouts (not monthly or quarterly) and collect property appreciation when you cash out.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/64109dc8add4994603530397_own%20multiple%20properties.webp)
### Own multiple properties without the landlord headaches
Diversify your portfolio without multiplying your workload. Vote on key property decisions, and professional property managers handle the rest.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/64109dd4855f7f09947f629d_keep%20full%20control.webp)
### Keep full control of your investments
Forget expensive brokers and lock-in periods. Easily reinvest your rental income for the long term, or list your holdings for sale whenever you like.
## Everyone deserves to own something real
Learn from our community building wealth for themselves and their families.
![A review from a real user of https://www.lofty.ai from @wackymadness on https://www.x.com. The review reads "Before the week is up I will be at $200 in rental income on Lofty. Can't wait to see the compounding of this account. Reinvest=Magic".](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/6390f6def8bdea788761a0b6_Testimonial%201.jpg)![A review from a real user of https://www.lofty.ai. The review was from Mark McDowell on Product Hunt. It reads "Love the company and the concept - I've been in since the very first property. I don't just think this is cool, I think it's the future of real estate."](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5eb83629a119283a8908371b/6390f6de16c6dda3342ccb9e_Testimonial%202.jpg)

generated_description:
**Lofty: The NASDAQ for Real Estate**

Founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator's S19 batch, Lofty is on a mission to democratize real estate investing. Based in Miami, FL, with a nimble team of just seven employees, Lofty operates a marketplace that allows anyone to buy into real estate starting at just $50. It’s a game-changer for investors looking to enter what has traditionally been a high-barrier market.

### How It Works

Lofty’s model breaks away from conventional one-to-one real estate transactions. Sellers can fractionalize their properties, allowing multiple investors to own shares. This flexible structure lets investors co-manage real estate assets via an online governance system. Participants have a real say in property management decisions, from handling repairs to deciding on selling the asset.

Investors access a diverse portfolio of properties, which could include everything from single-family homes to commercial properties and Airbnbs, all at the tip of their fingers. There's no lockup period; ownership can be traded directly between users through smart contracts over blockchain technology—meaning Lofty doesn’t handle or store any funds or assets, which enhances security and trust.

### A Community-Driven Approach

What’s particularly notable about Lofty is its commitment to community. Investors are not just passive participants; they interact and make decisions together about their investments. This dynamic opens a pathway for people who couldn't envision joining the real estate market—think millennials, working professionals, and even those simply seeking additional income streams.

### The Financial Upside

Lofty promises quick returns. Investors begin earning rental income immediately, often within the same day of investment, and benefit from the appreciation of property values over time. This unique model not only fosters wealth-building but also ensures that the everyday person has the tools to build a sustainable financial future without the burdens typically associated with real estate ownership, such as expensive down payments or property management hassles.

### Why Lofty Matters

In a world where rising property prices and stringent lending conditions have kept many from investing in real estate, Lofty stands out as a solution that seeks to change that narrative. Their vision of building the “NASDAQ for real estate” is ambitious, but with their distinctive approach, they might just reshape how we think about investment in this crucial asset class.

Whether you’re an experienced investor or a novice looking to dip your toes in the real estate waters, Lofty offers an innovative pathway to not just observe, but actively participate and grow in this lucrative market. 

You can explore more about their unique offerings on their website: [Lofty.ai](https://www.lofty.ai).
